name: rsi-levels
title: RSI Over-/Undersold Events
descriptions: Detects oversold and undersold events for rsi.

name: bollinger-bands
title: Bollinger Band Events
descriptions: Events where the candle goes outside of the bollinger bands.

name: support-resistance
title: Support and Resistances Levels
descriptions: Find lines that are common resistance of resistance zones.

name: highs-and-lows
title: High and Lows
descriptions: Local maxima and minima based on high and low prices.
